\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1055 T\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 rk\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 e\par
\par
Onlar bir yumurta yerler.\par
O bir portakal yer.\par
\f1\lang1033 #\f2\lang1049 Why not "O bir portakali yer"? since it is accusative?\par
\f1\lang1033 #\f2\lang1049 As far as i can tell, accusative is when you have e definite object. Here the indefenite adjective 'bir' seems to break that case\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Sen et yersin \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ay i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ersin.\par
Ben \f3\'ba\f0 eker yerim.\par
\f3\'ba\f0 eker\par
\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ilek - \f2\lang1049\'ea\'eb\'f3\'e1\'ed\'e8\'ea\'e0\par
\f0\lang1055 meyve - \f1\lang1033 fruit\par
ben peynir ve meyve yerim\par
\f0\lang1055 s\f3\u305?\f0 cak - \f1\lang1033 hot\par
\f0\lang1055 so\f3\u287?\f0 uk \f1\lang1033 - cold\par
makarna - pasta\par
\f0\lang1055 pasta - \f1\lang1033 cake\par
biz makarna ve pasta yeriz\par
\f0\lang1055 biz \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 orbay\f3\u305?\f0  i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 eriz.\par
ben kahveyi i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 erim. \f1\lang1033 I drink the coffee\par
\f0\lang1055 sen elmay\f3\u305?\f0  yersin.\par
\f1\lang1033 You eat the strawberry, I drink the wine\par
- \f0\lang1055 siz \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ile\f3\u287?\f0 i yersiniz, ben \f3\'ba\f0 arab\f3\u305?\f0  i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 erim\par
Bal\f3\u305?\u287?\u305?\f0  yersin.\par
Ben suyu ve s\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055  i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 erim\f2\lang1049\par
\par
\'ce\'e1\'f0\'e0\'e7\'ee\'e2\'e0\'ed\'e8\'e5 \'e2\'e8\'ed\'e8\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee\'e3\'ee \'ef\'e0\'e4\'e5\'e6\'e0:\par
\f0\lang1055 su - suyu; s\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t - s\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t\f1\lang1033\'fc\par
\f0\lang1055 yemek - yeme\f3\u287?\f0 i\f1\lang1033\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Sen tuzu yersin ve suyu i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ersin\par
Siz tuzu yersiniz ve suyu i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ersiniz\f1\lang1033\par
\f2\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1055 S\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055  i\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ersiniz\par
\par
yumurtay\f3\u305?\f0  yersin mi? \f1\lang1033 -\f0\lang1055\par
\f2\lang1049 yumurtay\f3\u305? yiyor musun?\f1\lang1033  + (yandex)\par
yumurta yer misin? + (google) (Do you eat eggs?)\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Evet, (biz) yo\f3\u287?\f0 urdu ve ekme\f3\u287?\f0 i yeriz.\par
\f2\lang1049\par
tavuk\f0\lang1055  - \f1\lang1033 chicken\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 kaplumba\f3\u287?\f0 am - \f1\lang1033 my turtle\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Benim bir k\f1\lang1033\'f6\f0\lang1055 pe\f3\u287?\f0 im var.\f1\lang1033  I have a dog.\par
\f0\lang1055 Benim bir ku\f3\'ba\f0 um var. \f1\lang1033 I have a bird.\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Bizim s\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 m\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 z yok. \f1\lang1033 We dp npt have milk.\par
\f0\lang1055 Onlar bizim adamlar\f3\u305?\f0 m\f3\u305?\f0 z. \f1\lang1033 They are our men.\par
\par
\f0\lang1055 Bizim s\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 t\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 m\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 z yok. \f1\lang1033 We do not have milk\par
\f0\lang1055\par
\f3\'baimdi ne yap\u305?yorsun\f1\lang1033 ?\f0\lang1055\par
\par
\f1\lang1033 <to be>\f0\lang1055\par
\f1\lang1033 I am happy. \f0\lang1055 Ben mutluyum. happy \f1\lang1033 - \f0\lang1055 mutlu\par
\f1\lang1033 but, however - \f0\lang1055 ama\f1\lang1033 . \f0\lang1055 Ben iyiyim ama o de\f3\u287?\f0 il. \f1\lang1033 I am fine but he is not.\par
I am young and beautiful. \f0\lang1055 Gencim ve g\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 zelim.\par
\f1\lang1033 Those women are beautiful. \f0\lang1055 O kad\f3\u305?nlar g\f1\lang1033\'fczeller\f0\lang1055 .\par
\f1\lang1033 No, he is not fine. \f0\lang1055 Hay\f3\u305?\f0 r, o iyi de\f3\u287?\f0 il.\par
\f1\lang1033\'c7\f0\lang1055 ok gencim. gen\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055  \f1\lang1033 - young\par
\f0\lang1055 Ben mutluyum  \f1\lang1033 [\f0\lang1055 y + um\f1\lang1033 ]\f2\lang1049\par
\f1\lang1033 Yes, we are women. \f0\lang1055 Evet, biz kad\f3\u305?\f0 n\f3\u305?\f0 z \f1\lang1033 [\f3\lang1055\u305?\f0 n\f3\u305?\f0 z\f1\lang1033 ] \par
We are children. \f0\lang1055 Biz \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ocu\f3\u287?\f0 uz\f2\lang1049\par
\f1\lang1033 He is a child, you are a man. \f0\lang1055 O bir \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ocuk, sen erkeksin.\f2\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1055 Sen bir erkeksin ve ben bir kad\f3\u305?\f0 n\f3\u305?\f0 m.\par
\f1\lang1033 calm - \f0\lang1055 tokum. Kaplumba\f3\u287?\f0 alar sakin de\f3\u287?\f0 il. \f1\lang1033 Turtles are not calm.\par
ya\f3\'bal\u305?y\u305?z ve a\f1\'e7\f3\u305?z\f0\lang1055 . a\f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055  \f2\lang1049 - \'e3\'ee\'eb\'ee\'e4\'ed\'fb\'e9, \f1\lang1033 hungry. We are old and hungry.\par
\par
The handsome child is very calm. Yak\f3\u305?\'ba\u305?kl\u305? \f1\'e7ocuk \'e7ok sakin.\par
\f0\lang1055 evet, yak\f3\u305?\'ba\u305?\f0 kl\f3\u305?\f1\lang1033  + [\f0\lang1055 s\f3\u305?\f0 n\f1\lang1033 ] Yes, you are handsome.\par
\'f6\f0\lang1055 rdekler ku\f3\'ba\f0 tur. Ducks are birds.\f1\lang1033\par
\f0\lang1055 ay\f3\u305?\f0  bir hayvand\f3\u305?\f0 r.\par
sakin ol! \f1\lang1033 calm down!\par
\f0\lang1055 yorgun bir \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ocuk\f1\lang1033\par
be happy! \f0\lang1055 mutlu ol!\par
ben \f1\lang1033\'e7\f0\lang1055 ok k\f1\lang1033\'fc\'e7\'fc\f3\lang1055\u287?\f1\lang1033\'fc\f0\lang1055 m \f1\lang1033 i am very young (or small =))\par
\f0\lang1055\par
\f1\lang1033 So\f3\u287?uk bir bira\f0\lang1055  \f3\lang1033 i\f1\'e7!\par
\f0\lang1055 O\f1\lang1033 nlar yumurta yer\f0\lang1055 . Onlar bir yumurta yerler. They eat an egg.\f1\lang1033\par
\f0\lang1055 S\f1\lang1033 en et yersin sen \'e7ay i\'e7ersin\f0\lang1055 . Sen et yersin, \f1\lang1033\'e7ay i\'e7ersin.\f0\lang1055  You eat meat, you drink tea.\par
onlar kitaplar\f3\u305? okur\f0 . Onlar kitaplar\f3\u305? okurlar.\f0  They read the books.\par
Kad\f3\u305?nlar elma yerler.\f0  The women eat apples.\par
\par

\f1\lang1033\par
